Name: FlowDot
About the game: The premise seems simple: Don't touch the lines! But rest assured, as challenges start becoming more difficult you will have to use all your timing, movement and puzzle solving skills to make it. Are you up for the challenge? - 50 levels of increasing madness. - 3 record times to beat for every level. - Slick, polished graphic style and motion design. - Soothing jazz soundtrack.
